en.title: Congratulations to Our World Champions! (Notice Wendy Chai Wearing FE's Quantum Pendant)
en.content:
World No 1: The Victorious Malaysian Women's Bowling Team 
(from left) Sharon Koh, Choy Poh Lai, Zandra Aziela Ibrahim Hakimi, Shalin Zulkifli,
Wendy Chai and Esther Cheah Posing After Winning the Team Gold
Medal at The Women's World Championships in Mexico on Wednesday, 05th September, 2007.
